grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 寮【リョウ】hostel, dormitory, bureau (government department beneath a ministry under the ritsuryo system)
寮生【リョウセイ】boarder, boarding student
大炊寮【オオイリョウ】Bureau of the Imperial Palace Kitchens (under the ritsuryo system)
女男性寮【メオセイリョウ】co-ed dormitory, mixed student accommodation
